explains: n. 认识，领悟；（目标等的）实现；变现，变卖；兑谱，改编；（语言特征的）体现；货物销售；发声，(戏剧)演出，设计成果

sentences.en: It was the realization of his greatest ambition.
sentences.cn: 这就实现了他的宏伟抱负。

sentences.en: We shall gladly lend every effort in our power toward its realization.
sentences.cn: 我们将乐意为它的实现而竭尽全力。

sentences.en: Without the participation of intellectuals, the realization of the four modernizations is impossible.
sentences.cn: 没有知识分子的参加，实现四化是不可能的。
